mapper.sql: c.fUuid AS `uuid`, c.fUserID AS `loginName`, c.fEntryType AS `entryType`, c.fContactPerson AS `contactPerson`, c.fQQ AS `qq`, c.fEmail AS `email`, c.fTelphone AS `telphone`, c.fAlipay AS `alipay`, c.fPaidFee AS `paidFee`, c.fType AS `type`, c.fRemark AS `remark`, c.fStatus AS `status`, c.fUpdateTime AS `updateTime`, c.fCreateTime AS `createTime`
mapper.select: SELECT c.fContactPerson AS 'contactPerson', c.fUuid AS 'uuid' FROM t_customer c WHERE c.fStatus = 1 order by c.fContactPerson

SELECT c.fUuid AS uuid, c.fContactPerson AS contactPerson FROM t_customer c RIGHT JOIN t_customer_keyword ck ON c.fUuid = ck.fCustomerUuid WHERE c.fUuid IS NOT NULL AND c.fStatus = 1
AND c.fContactPerson LIKE '%${contactPerson}%'
GROUP BY ck.fCustomerUuid
